mapper.insert: INSERT INTO education_records (year_month, week_number, subject, content, image_path) VALUES (#{yearMonth}, #{weekNumber}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{imagePath})
mapper.update: UPDATE education_records SET year_month = #{yearMonth}, week_number = #{weekNumber}, subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, image_path = #{imagePath}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM education_records ORDER BY year_month DESC, week_number
SELECT * FROM education_records WHERE subject LIKE CONCAT('%', #{subject}, '%') ORDER BY created_at DESC
